data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Haute-Loire, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Haute-Loire, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Haute-Loire who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 81 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 2,840 believers in Haute-Loire against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Haute-Loire. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Haute-Loire with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Haute-Loire, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Haute-Loire.

location.name: Haute-Loire
location.cities_list: Le Puy-en-Velay, Monistrol-sur-Loire, Brioude, Yssingeaux, Sainte-Sigolène
